name: Draw Symmetry
description:
Draw inside the empty boxes what you see on the boxes adjacent to it. This a fun drawing game that will test your cognitive abilities as well as your artistic nature. If you happen to be box logical & artistic then this is the game for you, otherwise it's time to brush up!

- 100's of levels
- Many different types of symmetry challenges
- Smooth drawing
- New concept
- 100% free to play!
